mapper.sql: w.id,w.payType, w.name, w.description, w.type, w.code, w.status, w.userID, w.createBy, w.createTime, w.updateBy, w.updateTime, w.version, w.isDeleted, w.fee,w.prepayID,w.refID
w.id,w.payType, w.name, w.description, w.type, w.code, w.status, w.userID, w.createBy, w.createTime, w.updateBy, w.updateTime, w.version, w.isDeleted, w.fee,w.prepayID,w.refID,u.nickName

where 1=1 and w.id = #{condition.id} and w.name = #{condition.name} and w.description = #{condition.description} and w.type = #{condition.type} and w.code = #{condition.code} and w.status = #{condition.status} and w.userID = #{condition.userID} and w.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and w.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and w.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy} and w.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and w.version = #{condition.version} and w.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and w.fee = #{condition.fee} and w.prepayID = #{condition.prepayID} and w.refID = #{condition.refID} and w.payType = #{condition.payType}

where 1=1 and w.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(w.name) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.name}),'%')) and UPPER(w.description) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.description}),'%')) and UPPER(w.type) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.type}),'%')) and UPPER(w.code) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.code}),'%')) and UPPER(w.status) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.status}),'%')) and UPPER(w.userID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.userID}),'%')) and UPPER(w.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(w.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(w.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%')) and UPPER(w.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(w.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(w.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(w.fee) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.fee}),'%')) and w.prepayID = #{condition.prepayID} and w.refID = #{condition.refID}
mapper.update: update wxorder set name=#{name}, description=#{description}, type=#{type}, code=#{code}, status=#{status}, userID=#{userID}, createBy=#{createBy}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, fee=#{fee}, prepayID=#{prepayID}, refID=#{refID}, payType=#{payType}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from wxorder w where w.id = #{id} and w.isDeleted = false
select from wxorder w left join shiro_user u on w.userID = u.id ${orderByClause}
